name: Burrow (itch) (AndyDalaimo)
description:
This game was made for the Global Games Jam 2023 in one weekend. The theme of the jam being "Roots", the player will control a bunny running away from the toxic cloud above, burrowing deep below until finding restored life. Platforming, dodging enemies, and outrunning the toxic cloud to reach his final destination. Ultimately, reconnecting with his roots...

Credits:

Art and Design - Birgithe Runde

Programming and Design - Andy Dalaimo
